head.title: National Briefing | South: Tennessee: Man Killed In Building Collapse

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | South: Tennessee: Man Killed In Building Collapse
hedline.hl2: Tennessee: Man Killed in Building Collapse

abstract.p: One construction worker is killed and another is injured when one-story building collapses in Nashville, Tenn (S)

block.p: One construction worker was killed and another injured when a one-story brick building collapsed in Nashville, the police said. The workers -- Richard Whiteshield, 57, of Clewiston, Fla., who was killed, and John Kemper of Hendersonville, Tenn., who was injured -- were part of a crew that was using a jackhammer to dig up a gas main to the building, which was being demolished, said Kristin Mumford, a spokeswoman for the Metropolitan Police Department. The building, in the city's Berry Hill neighborhood, had been closed for some time, said Kim Lawson, the deputy fire chief.

One construction worker was killed and another injured when a one-story brick building collapsed in Nashville, the police said. The workers  Richard Whiteshield, 57, of Clewiston, Fla., who was killed, and John Kemper of Hendersonville, Tenn., who was injured  were part of a crew that was using a jackhammer to dig up a gas main to the building, which was being demolished, said Kristin Mumford, a spokeswoman for the Metropolitan Police Department. The building, in the city’s Berry Hill neighborhood, had been closed for some time, said Kim Lawson, the deputy fire chief.
